paragraphs.subtitle: Fiction
paragraphs.note: * Note - only public domain for listening to fall asleep.
text: Fiction is my number one non-domestic animal love.
He shares my love of fiction.

paragraphs.subtitle: A wonderful, but occasionally annoying podcast
text: Jessica, Spencer and Kensley are fun to listen too
Jessica and Spencer can be annoying, but Kensley rarely is.
But like the way I feel about my cats,
I like them all equally in spite of their natures.
